definition: PlayStation 5 is a home video game console developed by Sony Interactive Entertainment, released in 2020.
Xbox Series X is a home video game console developed by Microsoft, released in 2020.
Windows 11 is an operating system developed by Microsoft, released in 2021.
macOS Ventura is the operating system for Apple's Mac computers, released in 2022.
JavaScript is a programming language used primarily for adding interactivity to web pages.
HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language and is used to create the structure of web pages.
CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets and is used to style the appearance of web pages.
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for building web and mobile applications.
API stands for Application Programming Interface. It is a set of rules and tools for building software applications, allowing different software systems to communicate with each other.
JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation. It is a lightweight data-interchange format that is easy for humans to read and write and easy for machines to parse and generate.
REST stands for Representational State Transfer. It is an architectural style for designing networked applications using stateless, client-server communication.

word: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
definition: An action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo, released in 2017.
A platform game developed and published by Nintendo, released in 2017.
A sandbox video game developed by Mojang Studios, originally released in 2011.
A life simulation video game developed and published by Nintendo, released in 2020.

word: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
definition: An action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo, released on May 12, 2023.
Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games, featuring a battle royale mode where players fight to be the last one standing.
Among Us is an online multiplayer social deduction game developed by InnerSloth, where players work to complete tasks while impostors attempt to sabotage their efforts.
Genshin Impact is an open-world action role-playing game developed and published by miHoYo, released in 2020.
Overwatch is a team-based first-person shooter game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment, featuring a diverse cast of characters.
Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia with articles written by volunteers and edited by anyone with internet access.
Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and versatility, used in web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.
Cloud computing is the delivery of computing services—including servers, storage, databases, networking, software, and more—over the internet (the cloud).
Machine learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that involves the development of algorithms that allow computers to learn from and make predictions based on data.
Blockchain is a decentralized digital ledger that records transactions across many computers so that the record cannot be altered retroactively.
IoT refers to the interconnected network of physical devices that collect and exchange data using embedded sensors, software, and other technologies.
Virtual Reality is a simulated experience that can be similar to or completely different from the real world, often experienced through VR headsets.
Augmented Reality overlays digital information on the real world, often viewed through devices like smartphones or AR glasses.
Cybersecurity involves the protection of computer systems and networks from digital attacks, theft, and damage.
A common greeting used to acknowledge someone.
A standard greeting used to start a conversation.
An informal greeting used to get someone's attention or say hello.
A farewell expression used when leaving or parting ways.
An informal way to say goodbye.
A casual way to say goodbye, indicating that you will meet again soon.
An expression of gratitude or appreciation.
A polite way to express gratitude.
A polite response to someone thanking you.
A common question used to inquire about someone's well-being.
A response indicating that you are doing well.
A request for assistance or support.
A more formal way to request help.
An expression of apology or regret.
A casual response to indicate that there is no issue.
